title: The Intelligence; “The effects are going to be long-lasting and dreadful”—America's abortion-rights rollback
text:
THE SUPREME COURT ruling has convulsed the country; passing the question of abortion rights to the states will divide America yet further. We ask what it means for the court to go so plainly against public opinion, examine the woeful effects the changing scenario will have on women and speak to one woman whose life was saved by a now-threatened procedure. Runtime: 25 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn

For full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
